languages.text: {n}Под гнетущим взором Винтерскейла его свита становится еще более отрешенной и безвольной. Все, кроме Серого Вортена, избегают обезумевших глаз господина.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Под гнетущим взором Винтерскейла его свита становится еще более отрешенной и безвольной. Все, кроме Серого Вортена, избегают обезумевших глаз господина.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Under the oppressive weight of Winterscale's gaze, his entourage grows even more lifeless and submissive. Everyone but Worten the Grey is trying not to look into the crazed eyes of their master.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Под гнетущим взором Винтерскейла его свита становится еще более отрешенной и безвольной. Все, кроме Серого Вортена, избегают обезумевших глаз господина.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Under the pressure of Winterscale's gaze, his entourage grows even more absent and weak-willed. Everyone but Worten the Grey avoid looking in the crazed eyes of their master.{/n}
{n}Under the pressure of Winterscale's gaze, his entourage grows even more absent and weak-willed. Everyone but Worten the Grey avoid looking in the crazed eyes of their master.{/n}

{n}Under the oppressive weight of Winterscale's gaze, his entourage grows even more lifeless and submissive. Everyone but Worten the Grey is trying not to look into the crazed eyes of their master.{/n}

{n}Under the oppressive weight of Winterscale's gaze, his entourage grows even more lifeless and submissive. Everyone but Worten the Grey is trying not to look into the crazed eyes of their master.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sometidos a la presión de la mirada de su amo, el séquito de Winterscale se vuelve aún más mustio y sumiso. Todos salvo Worten el Gris intentan evitar mirar a los ojos del enloquecido Comerciante Independiente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Under the oppressive weight of Winterscale's gaze, his entourage grows even more lifeless and submissive. Everyone but Worten the Grey is trying not to look into the crazed eyes of their master.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sometidos a la presión de la mirada de su amo, el séquito de Winterscale se vuelve más retraído y sumiso. Todos salvo Worten el Gris evitan mirar a los ojos del enloquecido Comerciante Independiente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}在温特斯凯尔沉重的凝视下，他的随从变得更加死气沉沉，畏畏缩缩。除了灰斑沃尔腾之外，每个人都试图避开他疯狂的目光。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Under the oppressive weight of Winterscale's gaze, his entourage grows even more lifeless and submissive. Everyone but Worten the Grey is trying not to look into the crazed eyes of their master.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在温特斯凯尔的凝视下，他的随从变得更加畏畏缩缩，心神不宁。除了灰斑沃尔腾之外，每个人都避免直视他疯狂的眼睛。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sous le poids insoutenable de son regard, les membres de son entourage s'effacent et se soumettent encore plus. Tout le monde, à l'exception de Worten le Gris, s'évertue à ne pas croiser le regard fou de Calligos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Under the oppressive weight of Winterscale's gaze, his entourage grows even more lifeless and submissive. Everyone but Worten the Grey is trying not to look into the crazed eyes of their master.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sous la pression de son regard, les membres de son entourage s'effacent encore plus. Tout le monde, à l'exception de Worten le Gris, évite de croiser le regard fou de Winterscale.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ウィンタースケールの視線の重圧の下で、側近たちはますます生気を失い、従順になっていく。ヴォルテン・ザ・グレイ以外は皆、主人の狂った目を見ないようにしている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Under the oppressive weight of Winterscale's gaze, his entourage grows even more lifeless and submissive. Everyone but Worten the Grey is trying not to look into the crazed eyes of their master.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ウィンタースケールの視線の重圧の下で、側近たちはますます生気を失い、従順になっていく。ヴォルテン・ザ・グレイ以外は皆、主人の狂った目を見ないようにしている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Unter dem Druck von Winterzunders Blick wird sein Gefolge noch lebloser, noch unterwürfiger. Alle außer Worten dem Grauen vermeiden es, in die wahnsinnigen Augen ihres Meisters zu sehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Under the oppressive weight of Winterscale's gaze, his entourage grows even more lifeless and submissive. Everyone but Worten the Grey is trying not to look into the crazed eyes of their master.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Unter dem Druck von Winterzunders Blick verliert sein Gefolge noch mehr seines Willens und wirkt noch abwesender. Alle außer Worten dem Grauen vermeiden es, in die wahnsinnigen Augen ihres Meisters zu sehen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Winterscale'in zulmeden bakışlarının ağırlığı altında ezilen maiyeti, daha da durgun ve itaatkâr bir mizaca bürünüyor. Gri Worten dışındaki herkes, efendilerinin deliye dönmüş gözlerinden bakışlarını kaçırmaya çalışıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Under the oppressive weight of Winterscale's gaze, his entourage grows even more lifeless and submissive. Everyone but Worten the Grey is trying not to look into the crazed eyes of their master.{/n}
